thread.title: Chicago defensive tackle gets offer from Vols
thread.title_full: Chicago defensive tackle gets offer from Vols

title: Chicago defensive tackle gets offer from Vols
text:
Chicago defensive tackle gets offer from Vols A three-star defensive tackle from Chicago received an offer from Tennessee on Friday. Slot to Tennessee Links 
Three-star junior defensive tackle Elijah Teague of Marist High School in Chicago posted on his Twitter account Friday that he received a scholarship offer from Tennessee. 
The 6-foot-3, 275-pound Teague claims offers from at least two dozen schools, including Oklahoma, Penn State, Louisville, Illinois and Wisconsin. 
He's ranked the nation's No. 550 overall prospect and No. 39 defensive tackle in the 247Sports Composite for the 2018 class. Author
